description:
computer manager should log driver class in NotImplemented error. 
It will easy out the debugging process in case the driver import is misconfigured.
title: computer manager should log driver class in NotImplemented error

Author: Nikhil Komawar <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jul 18 10:48:59 2012 -0400

    Info log to see which compute driver has loaded
    
    Adding this log will help keep track if the
    intended compute driver has loaded or it has been
    misconfigured.
    
    fixes bug 1021417
